functions.name: CreateInterval
functions.description:
Creates a new interval that calls the given function every `ms` milliseconds.
This interval will be automatically cleared on shutdown.

parameters.name: func
parameters.description: the function to call every interval

parameters.name: ms
parameters.description: the interval in milliseconds

returns.name: threadId
returns.description: the thread id of the created interval

functions.name: CreateThread
functions.description:
Creates a new thread that runs the given function.
This just calles `Timer.CreateThread` internally.

parameters.name: func
parameters.description: the function to run in the new thread

functions.name: Wait
functions.description:
Waits for the given amount of milliseconds.
This just calles `Timer.Wait` internally.

parameters.name: ms
parameters.description: the amount of milliseconds to wait

parameters.name: thread
parameters.description: the thread id of the thread to clear

functions.name: startShutdown
functions.description: Starts the shutdown process by calling all registered shutdown functions.

functions.name: onShutdown
functions.description: Registers a function to be called on shutdown.

parameters.name: func
parameters.description: the function to call on shutdown

functions.name: print
functions.description:
Performs a simple print.
This just calls the global `print` function.

functions.name: CreateObject
functions.description:
Creates a new static object in the world.
This will also track the object for deletion on shutdown.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: the model to use for the object

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: the position to spawn the object at

parameters.name: rotation
parameters.description: the rotation to spawn the object with

functions.name: AttachEntityToCharacter
functions.description: Attaches the given object to the given character at the specified bone.

parameters.name: object
parameters.description: the object to attach

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: the character to attach the object to

parameters.name: boneName
parameters.description: the name of the bone to attach the object to

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: the relative coordinates to attach the object at

parameters.name: rotation
parameters.description: the relative rotation to attach the object with

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: additional arguments

functions.name: DetachEntity
functions.description: Detaches the given object from any actor it is attached to.

parameters.name: object
parameters.description: the object to detach

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: additional arguments

functions.name: DeleteObject
functions.description:
Deletes the given object from the world.
This will also remove the object from the tracked objects for shutdown.

parameters.name: object
parameters.description: the object to delete

functions.name: printf
functions.description: Prints a formatted string to the console.

parameters.name: msg
parameters.description: the message to format

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: the arguments to replace in the message. Use {key} in the message to denote where to replace.
